content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARM
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: TSPARMCD
Core:
  Id: CORE-000179
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when TSPARM and TSPARMCD don't have a one-to-one relationship.
Outcome:
  Message: TSPARM and TSPARMCD don't have a one-to-one relationship.
  Output Variables:
    - TSPARM
    - TSPARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0307
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "'TSPARMCD (the companion to TSPARM)'"
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Raise an error when TSPARM and TSPARMCD don't have a one-to-one relationship.

Outcome.Message: TSPARM and TSPARMCD don't have a one-to-one relationship.
